name: coe_neg_sphere
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
i : SeminormedAddCommGroup E
r : Real
v : ↑(Metric.sphere 0 r)
⊢ Eq (↑(Neg.neg v)) (Neg.neg ↑v)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_neg_sphere {r : ℝ} (v : sphere (0 : E) r) : ↑(-v) = (-v : E) :=
  rfl

name: instContinuousNegElemSphereOfNat
initialProofState:
E : Type u_1
i : SeminormedAddCommGroup E
r : Real
⊢ ContinuousNeg ↑(Metric.sphere 0 r)
decl: instance : ContinuousNeg (sphere (0 : E) r) := IsInducing.subtypeVal.continuousNeg fun _ => rfl
